akn:section.akn:heading: Report on the long-term health effects of living organ donation

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 273b. Report on the long-term health effects of living organ donation Not later than 1 year after December 21, 2007, and annually thereafter, the Secretary of Health and Human Services shall submit to the appropriate committees of Congress a report that details the progress made towards understanding the long-term health effects of living organ donation. (Pub. L. 110–144, § 3, Dec. 21, 2007, 121 Stat. 1814.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the Charlie W. Norwood Living Organ Donation Act, and not as part of the Public Health Service Act which comprises this chapter.
